ISSUE.TITLE: GetProductSpecificationAttributes caches incorrectly
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: If this function is initially called using an optional specificationAttributeOptionId param then subsequent calls only return the same single record. The cache key is /// {0} : product ID /// {1} : allow filtering /// {2} : show on product page /// </remarks> private const string PRODUCTSPECIFICATIONATTRIBUTE_ALLBYPRODUCTID_KEY = "Nop.productspecificationattribute.allbyproductid-{0}-{1}-{2}" so does not take into account the specificationAttributeOptionId param.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Further changes to the moving anti-forgery filters commit

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #2230 Fix the incorrect cache key in the GetProductSpecificationAttributes method
